title: Hypersomnia - SleepyTime Studio
descriptions: SleepyTime Studio was created by a group of university students with the aim to create and publish a Horror game. We were no more than 9 individuals with a software development background. 'Waterfall methodologies' were applied during development.
As a gameplay and asset programmer, I was tasked with designing and implementing the following:
&#x2022 Adding functionalities to all interactable in the game
I have also had the chance to make some 3D models and texture them using 3ds Max.
